location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Sketch of route to Jabal Al Huria from Al Kasha.’

mods.abstract: Reproduction of a map in black ink indicating the route to Jabal Al Huria [Jabal Ḩūrīyah] from Al Kasha [Al Qash‘ah]. The map indicates: the contours of the landscape; villages; rivers and other water sources; and a dotted line indicating the route. Lettered annotations (A-E) indicate villages in the vicinity of the route, as described in the map’s key. Notes below the key specify the inhabitants of the villages and surrounding country. The map is signed J K T [Major J K Tod] and dated 25 February 1902.
